classifier-config.name: Discharge Disposition
classifier-config.description: Describes a patient's status after leaving the facility.

category.name: Discharged to Home
category.description: Discharged to home or self care (routine discharge)

category.name: Hospital Transfer
category.description: Discharged/transferred to another short term general hospital for inpatient care

category.name: ICF Transfer
category.description: Discharged/transferred to an intermediate care facility (ICF)

category.name: Other Transfer
category.description: Discharged/transferred to another type of institution

category.name: Home Health Transfer
category.description: Discharged/transferred to home under care of organized home health service organization

category.name: AMA
category.description: Left against medical advice or discontinued care

category.name: Home IV Transfer
category.description: Discharged/transferred to home under care of Home IV provider

category.name: Admitted
category.description: Admitted as an inpatient to this hospital

category.name: Discharge TBD
category.description: Discharge to be defined at state level, if necessary

category.name: Deceased TBD
category.description: Expired to be defined at state level, if necessary

category.name: Still a Patient
category.description: Still patient or expected to return for outpatient services (i.e. still a patient)

category.name: Still a Patient TBD
category.description: Still patient to be defined at state level, if necessary i.e. still a patient)

category.name: DOA Other Facility
category.description: Expired (i.e. died) in a medical facility; e.g., hospital, SNF, ICF, or free standing hospice
